titleStmt.title: A ministers mite cast into the stocke of a weake memory: helpt by rules and experiments. VVith a winter night schoole tutoring discourse to generous youth.
titleStmt.author: Jerome, Stephen, fl. 1604-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. and are to be sold by John Saywell, at the Greyhound in Little Brittaine,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
